column4: Hello there. I'm trying to install nvidia graphics drivers, but in order to do that, I need to get out of xwindows/server. How can I do that on Ubuntu?
don't do the installer from nvidia, use the ones provided by ubuntu

sudo apt-get install linux-restricted-modules-`uname -r` nvidia-glx && sudo nvidia-glx-config enable ... paste this line to a terminal, and press ctrl-alt-backspace and you should have 3D nvidia working
so you get the extar-points for paying attention :-)
